snippet: Mr. Schulman, a former mayor of White Plains, was a New York City parks official who helped ease residents’ opposition to a sewage plant in Harlem by creating Riverbank State Park.
abstract: Sy J Schulman, New York City parks planner, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schulman, a former mayor of White Plains, was a New York City parks official who helped ease residents’ opposition to a sewage plant in Harlem by creating Riverbank State Park.

headline.seo: Sy J. Schulman, Planner Who Oversaw New York City Parks, Dies at 86
headline.main: Sy J. Schulman, Planner for New York City Parks, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Sy J. Schulman, 86, New York Parks Planner
